issue.title: [CI] Fix parallelization error with Ubuntu 20.20 docs (Sphinx)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=5044&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181&l=21913

The error is: _File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/dist-packages/sphinx/util/parallel.py", line 117, in terminate_

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12765?focusedCommentId=17344464) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This is due to a bug in the newly release sphinx 4.0 version (https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/issues/9210). We could pin sphinx to 3.5, but since it seems a bug-fix release might happen this weekend, can also wait a bit and it should automatically be resolved.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12765?focusedCommentId=17344584) by Mauricio 'Pachá' Vargas Sepúlveda (pachamaltese):*
thanks Joris, I'm gonna comment this in the report as "waiting for external fix"

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12765?focusedCommentId=17364096) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This is fixed now I think, so closing
